Package com.azure.storage.blob

Package containing the classes for StorageClient.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnonymousCredentialPolicy
    Anonymous credentials are to be used with with HTTP(S) requests that read blobs from public containers or requests that use a Shared Access Signature (SAS).
    AppendBlobAsyncClient
    Client to an append blob.
    AppendBlobClient
    Client to an append blob.
    AppendBlobClientBuilder
    Fluent AppendBlobClientBuilder for instantiating a AppendBlobClient or AppendBlobAsyncClient using AppendBlobClientBuilder.buildAsyncClient() or AppendBlobClientBuilder.buildAsyncClient() respectively.
    BlobAsyncClient
    Client to a blob of any type: block, append, or page.
    BlobClient
    Client to a blob of any type: block, append, or page.
    BlobClientBuilder
    Fluent BlobClientBuilder for instantiating a BlobClient or BlobAsyncClient using BlobClientBuilder.buildClient() or BlobClientBuilder.buildAsyncClient() respectively.
    BlobInputStream
    Provides an input stream to read a given blob resource.
    BlobOutputStream  
    BlobProperties  
    BlockBlobAsyncClient
    Client to a block blob.
    BlockBlobClient
    Client to a block blob.
    BlockBlobClientBuilder
    Fluent BlockBlobClientBuilder for instantiating a BlockBlobClient or BlockBlobAsyncClient using BlockBlobClientBuilder.buildClient() or BlockBlobClientBuilder.buildAsyncClient() respectively.
    ContainerAsyncClient
    Client to a container.
    ContainerClient
    Client to a container.
    ContainerClientBuilder
    Fluent ContainerClientBuilder for instantiating a ContainerClient or ContainerAsyncClient using ContainerClientBuilder.buildClient() or ContainerClientBuilder.buildAsyncClient() respectively.
    ContainerProperties  
    DownloadAsyncResponse
    DownloadAsyncResponse wraps the protocol-layer response from BlobAsyncClient.download(BlobRange, BlobAccessConditions, boolean, ReliableDownloadOptions) to automatically retry failed reads from the body as appropriate.
    DownloadResponse  
    PageBlobAsyncClient
    Client to a page blob.
    PageBlobClient
    Client to a page blob.
    PageBlobClientBuilder
    Fluent PageBlobClientBuilder for instantiating a PageBlobClient or PageBlobAsyncClient using PageBlobClientBuilder.buildClient() or PageBlobClientBuilder.buildAsyncClient() respectively.
    StorageAsyncClient
    Client to a storage account.
    StorageClient
    Client to a storage account.
    StorageClientBuilder
    Fluent StorageClientBuilder for instantiating a StorageClient or StorageAsyncClient using StorageClientBuilder.buildClient() or StorageClientBuilder.buildAsyncClient() respectively.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    StorageException
    A StorageException is thrown whenever Azure Storage successfully returns an error code that is not 200-level.

Package com.azure.storage.blob Description

Package containing the classes for StorageClient.
